00048 #define CONTACT_DIFF_EPSILON 0.00001f

00058 class GIM_CONTACT
00059 {
00060 public:
00061     btVector3 m_point;
00062     btVector3 m_normal;
00063     GREAL m_depth;//Positive value indicates interpenetration
00064     GREAL m_distance;//Padding not for use
00065     GUINT m_feature1;//Face number
00066     GUINT m_feature2;//Face number
00067 public:
00068     GIM_CONTACT()
00069     {
00070     }
00071 
00072     GIM_CONTACT(const GIM_CONTACT & contact):
00073                                 m_point(contact.m_point),
00074                                 m_normal(contact.m_normal),
00075                                 m_depth(contact.m_depth),
00076                                 m_feature1(contact.m_feature1),
00077                                 m_feature2(contact.m_feature2)
00078     {
00079         m_point = contact.m_point;
00080         m_normal = contact.m_normal;
00081         m_depth = contact.m_depth;
00082         m_feature1 = contact.m_feature1;
00083         m_feature2 = contact.m_feature2;
00084     }
00085 
00086     GIM_CONTACT(const btVector3 &point,const btVector3 & normal,
00087                                 GREAL depth, GUINT feature1, GUINT feature2):
00088                                 m_point(point),
00089                                 m_normal(normal),
00090                                 m_depth(depth),
00091                                 m_feature1(feature1),
00092                                 m_feature2(feature2)
00093     {
00094     }
00095 
00097     SIMD_FORCE_INLINE GUINT calc_key_contact() const
00098     {
00099         GINT _coords[] = {
00100                 (GINT)(m_point[0]*1000.0f+1.0f),
00101                 (GINT)(m_point[1]*1333.0f),
00102                 (GINT)(m_point[2]*2133.0f+3.0f)};
00103                 GUINT _hash=0;
00104                 GUINT *_uitmp = (GUINT *)(&_coords[0]);
00105                 _hash = *_uitmp;
00106                 _uitmp++;
00107                 _hash += (*_uitmp)<<4;
00108                 _uitmp++;
00109                 _hash += (*_uitmp)<<8;
00110                 return _hash;
00111     }
00112 
00113     SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void interpolate_normals( btVector3 * normals,GUINT normal_count)
00114     {
00115         btVector3 vec_sum(m_normal);
00116                 for(GUINT i=0;i<normal_count;i++)
00117                 {
00118                         vec_sum += normals[i];
00119                 }
00120 
00121                 GREAL vec_sum_len = vec_sum.length2();
00122                 if(vec_sum_len <CONTACT_DIFF_EPSILON) return;
00123 
00124                 GIM_INV_SQRT(vec_sum_len,vec_sum_len); // 1/sqrt(vec_sum_len)
00125 
00126                 m_normal = vec_sum*vec_sum_len;
00127     }
00128 
00129 };

00133 class gim_contact_array:public gim_array<GIM_CONTACT>
00134 {
00135 public:
00136         gim_contact_array():gim_array<GIM_CONTACT>(64)
00137         {
00138         }
00139 
00140         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void push_contact(const btVector3 &point,const btVector3 & normal,
00141                                 GREAL depth, GUINT feature1, GUINT feature2)
00142         {
00143                 push_back_mem();
00144                 GIM_CONTACT & newele = back();
00145                 newele.m_point = point;
00146                 newele.m_normal = normal;
00147                 newele.m_depth = depth;
00148                 newele.m_feature1 = feature1;
00149                 newele.m_feature2 = feature2;
00150         }
00151 
00152         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void push_triangle_contacts(
00153                 const GIM_TRIANGLE_CONTACT_DATA & tricontact,
00154                 GUINT feature1,GUINT feature2)
00155         {
00156                 for(GUINT i = 0;i<tricontact.m_point_count ;i++ )
00157                 {
00158                         push_back_mem();
00159                         GIM_CONTACT & newele = back();
00160                         newele.m_point = tricontact.m_points[i];
00161                         newele.m_normal = tricontact.m_separating_normal;
00162                         newele.m_depth = tricontact.m_penetration_depth;
00163                         newele.m_feature1 = feature1;
00164                         newele.m_feature2 = feature2;
00165                 }
00166         }
00167 
00168         void merge_contacts(const gim_contact_array & contacts, bool normal_contact_average = true);
00169         void merge_contacts_unique(const gim_contact_array & contacts);
00170 };
